pp2.7:1.1_0: Kathañca puggalo sakiṁ nimuggo nimuggova hoti?
pp2.7:1.2_0: Idhekacco puggalo samannāgato hoti ekantakāḷakehi akusalehi dhammehi.
pp2.7:1.3_0: Evaṁ puggalo sakiṁ nimuggo nimuggova hoti.
pp2.7:2.2_0: Idhekacco puggalo ummujjati “sāhu saddhā kusalesu dhammesu,
pp2.7:2.3_0: Tassa sā saddhā neva tiṭṭhati no vaḍḍhati hāyatiyeva,
pp2.7:2.3_1: tassa sā hirī neva tiṭṭhati no vaḍḍhati hāyatiyeva,
pp2.7:2.3_2: tassa taṁ ottappaṁ neva tiṭṭhati no vaḍḍhati hāyatiyeva,
pp2.7:2.3_3: tassa taṁ vīriyaṁ neva tiṭṭhati no vaḍḍhati hāyatiyeva,
pp2.7:2.3_4: tassa sā paññā neva tiṭṭhati no vaḍḍhati hāyatiyeva.
pp2.7:3.2_0: Idhekacco puggalo ummujjati “sāhu saddhā kusalesu dhammesu,
pp2.7:3.3_0: Tassa sā saddhā neva hāyati no vaḍḍhati ṭhitā hoti,
pp2.7:3.3_1: tassa sā hirī neva hāyati no vaḍḍhati ṭhitā hoti,
pp2.7:3.3_2: tassa taṁ ottappaṁ neva hāyati no vaḍḍhati ṭhitaṁ hoti,
pp2.7:3.3_3: tassa taṁ vīriyaṁ neva hāyati no vaḍḍhati ṭhitaṁ hoti,
pp2.7:3.3_4: tassa sā paññā neva hāyati no vaḍḍhati ṭhitā hoti.
pp2.7:4.2_0: Idhekacco puggalo ummujjati “sāhu saddhā kusalesu dhammesu,
pp2.7:4.3_0: So tiṇṇaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ parikkhayā sotāpanno hoti avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyano.
pp2.7:5.2_0: Idhekacco puggalo ummujjati “sāhu saddhā kusalesu dhammesu,
pp2.7:5.3_0: So tiṇṇaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ parikkhayā rāgadosamohānaṁ tanuttā sakadāgāmī hoti sakideva imaṁ lokaṁ āgantvā dukkhassantakaro hoti.
pp2.7:6.2_0: Idhekacco puggalo ummujjati “sāhu saddhā kusalesu dhammesu,
pp2.7:6.3_0: So pañcannaṁ orambhāgiyānaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ parikkhayā opapātiko hoti tattha parinibbāyī anāvattidhammo tasmā lokā.
pp2.7:7.1_0: Kathañca puggalo ummujjitvā tiṇṇo hoti pāraṅgato thale tiṭṭhati brāhmaṇo?
pp2.7:7.2_0: Idhekacco puggalo ummujjati “sāhu saddhā kusalesu dhammesu,
pp2.7:7.3_0: So āsavānaṁ khayā anāsavaṁ cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati.
pp2.7:7.4_0: Evaṁ puggalo ummujjitvā tiṇṇo hoti pāraṅgato thale tiṭṭhati brāhmaṇo.
pp2.7:8.2_0: Idhekacco puggalo aṭṭha vimokkhe kāyena phusitvā viharati paññāya cassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā honti.
pp2.7:14.2_0: Yassa puggalassa sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipannassa saddhindriyaṁ adhimattaṁ hoti,
pp2.7:14.4_0: Sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo saddhānusārī, phale ṭhito saddhāvimuttoti.
